import openpyxl
import json

# Read ARDC PP Final report
wb = openpyxl.load_workbook\(''C:/Dev/Rawabi Final Report/ARDC PP Final report.xlsx''\)
print\(''=== ARDC PP Final report.xlsx ===''\)
print\(''Sheets:'', wb.sheetnames\)
for sheet_name in wb.sheetnames[:5]:  # First 5 sheets
    ws = wb[sheet_name]
    print\(f''\\n--- Sheet: {sheet_name} ---''\)
    rows = list\(ws.iter_rows\(max_row=15, values_only=True\)\)
    for i, row in enumerate\(rows\):
        if any\(cell is not None for cell in row\):
            print\(f''Row {i+1}:'', [str\(c\)[:60] if c else '''' for c in row[:8]]\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\hp\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
import openpyxl

# Read ALL data from ARDC PP Final report - Additional Findings
wb = openpyxl.load_workbook\(''C:/Dev/Rawabi Final Report/ARDC PP Final report.xlsx''\)
ws = wb[''Additional Findings'']
print\(''=== ARDC PP - Additional Findings \(All\) ===''\)
for i, row in enumerate\(ws.iter_rows\(values_only=True\)\):
    if i >= 5 and any\(cell is not None for cell in row\):
        topic = str\(row[0]\)[:50] if row[0] else ''''
        typ = str\(row[1]\) if row[1] else ''''
        risk = str\(row[2]\) if row[2] else ''''
        details = str\(row[3]\)[:100] if row[3] else ''''
        print\(f''{i+1}. [{risk}] {topic}''\)
        print\(f''   Type: {typ}''\)
        print\(f''   Details: {details}...''\)
        print\(\)
")

Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 >nul & ""C:\\Users\\hp\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe"" -c ""
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import openpyxl
import sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=''utf-8''\)

files = [
    \(''C:/Dev/Rawabi Final Report/ARDC PP Final report.xlsx'', ''ARDC PP''\),
    \(''C:/Dev/Rawabi Final Report/ARDC Sales Final report.xlsx'', ''ARDC Sales''\),
    \(''C:/Dev/Rawabi Final Report/ENF and GF final report.xlsx'', ''ENF/GF''\)
]

for filepath, name in files:
    wb = openpyxl.load_workbook\(filepath\)
    obtained = list\(wb[''Obtained Items''].iter_rows\(min_row=6, values_only=True\)\)
    obtained_count = len\([r for r in obtained if r[0] is not None]\)
    missing = list\(wb[''Missing Items''].iter_rows\(min_row=6, values_only=True\)\)
    missing_count = len\([r for r in missing if r[0] is not None]\)
    findings = list\(wb[''Additional Findings''].iter_rows\(min_row=6, values_only=True\)\)
    findings_count = len\([r for r in findings if r[0] is not None]\)
    high_risk = len\([r for r in findings if r[0] is not None and r[2] == ''high'']\)
    print\(f''{name}: Obtained={obtained_count}, Missing={missing_count}, Findings={findings_count}, High Risk={high_risk}''\)
""")

Bash("C:\\Users\\hp\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=''utf-8''\)
with open\(''Emirates_Rawabi_Group_Complete_Audit_Report.html'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Count findings in the report
finding_count = content.count\(''<td><strong>F-''\)
table_count = content.count\(''<table class=""data-table"">''\)
section_count = content.count\(''class=""category-section""''\)

print\(f''Total finding rows in tables: {finding_count}''\)
print\(f''Total data tables: {table_count}''\)
print\(f''Category sections: {section_count}''\)
print\(f''File size: {len\(content\):,} characters''\)

# Check categories present
categories = [''quality'', ''production'', ''feed'', ''livestock'', ''sales'', ''inventory'', ''costing'', ''integration'', ''manual'', ''performance'']
for cat in categories:
    if f''id=""appendix-{cat}""'' in content:
        print\(f''  - appendix-{cat}: Present''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\hp\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=''utf-8''\)
with open\(''Emirates_Rawabi_Group_Final_Report_with_Flowcharts.html'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Verify content
print\(f''File size: {len\(content\):,} characters \({len\(content\)/1024/1024:.2f} MB\)''\)
print\(f''Finding rows: {content.count\(""<td><strong>F-""\)}''\)
print\(f''Process references: {content.count\(""class=\\""process-ref\\""""\)}''\)
print\(f''Flowchart containers: {content.count\(""flowchart-container""\)}''\)
print\(f''Flow boxes: {content.count\(""flow-box""\)}''\)

# Check process step mappings
print\(\)
print\(''Process steps in flowcharts:''\)
for step in [''PP-01'', ''PP-05'', ''PP-10'', ''SD-01'', ''SD-05'', ''SD-10'', ''PF-01'', ''PF-08'', ''PF-15'']:
    count = content.count\(f''>{step}<''\)
    print\(f''  {step}: {count} references''\)
")
